headline.main: RUSSIANS FIGHT ON IN PRIPET MARSHES; 12-Year Old Guerrilla Reported Executed by the Germans

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, Sweden, Aug. 1 -A 12-year-old boy was shot by the Germans in the Pripet Marshes, south of Minsk in a region overrun by the Germans in the early stages of the war in Russia, but in which strong Russian guerilla units still are inflicting heavy losses on the Germans, reports a war correspondent of Dagens Nyheter in a dispatch datelined "An Airfield 200 Kilometers East of the Pripet Marshes."
abstract: 12-yr-old USSR guerrilla reptd executed by Gers, Pripet Marshes, near Minsk
